name: createShop
description: create a shop from start. All colors should be in RGB format like white = 255 255 255
parameters: {'type': 'object', 'properties': {'shopName': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'name given to the shop'}, 'shopCategory': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'the kind of product the shop sell', 'enum': ['Clothing', 'Food']}, 'primaryColor': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'the primary color of the shop which also serves as the default background color of the shop'}, 'secondaryColor': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'secondary color of the shop. Should mostly contrast the primary color. Also serves as the default color of prices on carousels'}, 'secondary2': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'serves as the color for CTAs on the shop'}, 'accentColor': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'accent color of the shop. serves as the colors to discount prices on products'}, 'neutralColor': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'the color of neutral or inactive elements in the shop UI.'}, 'textColor': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'the color of the text in the shop. should also try and contrast the primary color since most texts are also written on the primary background color'}}}
